node.title: Wrongly jailed man feared being raped by inmate after being told to shave legs, court told
node.alt: Cell block of Townsville Correctional Centre
node.description: A man suing a Federal Court judge who wrongly jailed him for contempt during divorce proceedings, says his time in jail has left him traumatised and unable to work.
node.content:
["A man suing an Australian judge for wrongly jailing him, has told a court\u00a0he thought he was going to be raped by an inmate who told him to shave his legs.", "The Brisbane man is suing Federal Circuit Court Judge Salvatore Vasta, after he spent six nights in custody in 2018.", "Sitting judges usually have judicial immunity protection, so the case, which is before the Federal Court, is rare.", "The man, who can only be referred to by the pseudonym, Mr Stradford, was in a routine divorce settlement with his ex-wife, when Judge Vasta jailed him for contempt because he could not produce documents.", "Mr Stradford, who represented himself in the divorce case, alleges he was jailed without being found guilty and given a chance to respond. His 12-month sentence was stayed and overturned by a higher court.", "He is seeking about $2 million compensation, claiming that his time in jail left him with psychiatric issues that affect his ability to work.", "Mr Stradford broke down as he described how a prison inmate, who worked in the kitchen, followed him to his cell.", "He said the inmate was tall and thick-set, with rotten teeth and shaggy black hair.", "\"I was told to be careful of him because he was on the drug ice,\"\u00a0he said.", "\"He grabbed my arse when I was on muster\u00a0and I tried to laugh it off.", "\"He said to me, 'You'd look a lot sexier if you shaved your legs',\"\u00a0Mr Stradford told the court.", "When asked why he didn't complain to prison guards, Mr Stradford said he feared repercussions.", "\"To a prisoner they are the enemy, the screws.", "\"A lot of people in there had shaved legs, so I did it to conform. I was scared.", "\"I wasn't raped. A grab on the arse is one thing, but there's a difference between that and something more happening to you.\"", "Mr Stradford said because he was under observation for self-harm, he was in maximum security with serious offenders.", "He said he has nightmares and flashbacks and has thought about harming himself.", "", "
Federal Circuit Court Judge Salvatore Vasta is being sued for $2 million.(www.qldcricket.com.au)
", "Mr Stradford's barrister, Perry Herzfeld SC, has previously told the court his client was subjected to \"the grossest parody of a court hearing\", with Judge Vasta behaving like the Queen of Hearts in Alice In Wonderland.", "\"Her catchphrase was always sentence first, verdict afterwards,\" Mr Herzfeld said.", "Judge Vasta's barrister, Jeremy Kirk SC has told the court his client jailed Mr Stradford because he mistakenly thought another judge who had also dealt with the case, had already found him guilty.", "Mr Kirk has argued that the mistake was rectified by an appeal court and Mr Stratford was released from jail soon after it was discovered.", "He has told the court a finding that Judge Vasta's mistake breached his judicial immunity could leave judges around the country vulnerable to being sued every time they err in their \"daily task of sentencing\".", "The trial continues."]
